summary.long: 1 Chronicles is a book of the Old Testament.

verses.text: Adam, Seth, Enosh;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Kenan, Mahalalel, Jared;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Enoch, Methuselah, Lamech;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Japheth: Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan, Tubal, Meshech, and Tiras.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Gomer: Ashkenaz, Diphath, and Togarmah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Javan: Elishah, Tarshish, Kittim, and Rhodanim.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Ham: Cush, Mizraim, Put, and Canaan.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Cush: Seba, Havilah, Sabta, Raamah, and Sabteca. And the sons of Raamah: Sheba and Dedan.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Cush fathered Nimrod; he himself began to be mighty on earth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Mizraim fathered the Ludim, the Anamim, the Lehabim, the Naphtuhim,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: the Pathrusim, the Casluhim (from whence the Philistines descended), and the Caphtorim.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Canaan fathered Zidon his firstborn, and Heth,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and the Jebusites, the Amorites, the Girgashites,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: the Hivites, the Arkites, the Sinites,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: the Arvadites, the Zemarites, and the Hamathites.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Shem: Elam, Asshur, Arphaxad, Lud, Aram, Uz, Hul, Gether, and Meshech.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Arphaxad fathered Shelah; and Shelah fathered Eber.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And two sons were born to Eber: the name of the one was Peleg (for in his days the earth was divided), and the name of his brother was Joktan.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Joktan fathered Almodad, Sheleph, Hazarmaveth, Jerah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Hadoram, Uzal, Diklah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ebal, Abimael, Sheba,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ophir, Havilah, and Jobab; all these were the sons of Joktan.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Shem, Arphaxad, Shelah;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Eber, Peleg, Reu;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Serug, Nahor, Terah;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Abram, that is, Abraham.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Abraham: Isaac and Ishmael.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These are their generations: the firstborn of Ishmael, Nebaioth, and Kedar, Abdeel, Mibsam,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Mishma, Dumah, Massa, Hadad, Tema,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Jetur, Naphish, and Kedmah. These are the sons of Ishmael.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Keturah, Abraham’s concubine: she gave birth to Zimran, Jokshan, Medan, Midian, Ishbak, and Shuah. And the sons of Jokshan: Sheba and Dedan.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Midian: Ephah, Epher, Enoch, Abida, and Eldaah. All these were the sons of Keturah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Abraham fathered Isaac. The sons of Isaac: Esau and Israel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Esau: Eliphaz, Reuel, Jeush, Jalam, and Korah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Eliphaz: Teman, Omar, Zephi, Gatam, Kenaz, Timna, and Amalek.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Reuel: Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, and Mizzah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Seir: Lotan, Shobal, Zibeon, Anah, Dishon, Ezer, and Dishan.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Lotan: Hori and Homam; and the sister of Lotan was Timna.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Shobal: Alian, Manahath, Ebal, Shephi, and Onam. And the sons of Zibeon: Aiah and Anah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Anah: Dishon. And the sons of Dishon: Hamran, Eshban, Ithran, and Keran.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Ezer: Bilhan, Zaavan, and Jaakan. The sons of Dishan: Uz and Aran.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These are the kings who reigned in the land of Edom before any king reigned over the Israelites: Bela son of Beor, and the name of his city was Dinhabah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: When Bela died, Jobab son of Zerah from Bozrah reigned in his place.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: When Jobab died, Husham from the land of the Temanites reigned in his place.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: When Husham died, Hadad son of Bedad, who defeated the Midianites in the country of Moab, reigned in his place. And the name of his city was Avith.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: When Hadad died, Samlah from Masrekah reigned in his place.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: When Samlah died, Shaul from Rehoboth-by-the-River reigned in his place.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: When Shaul died, Baal-Hanan son of Achbor reigned in his place.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: When Baal-Hanan died, Hadad reigned in his place, and the name of his city was Pai. And the name of his wife was Mehetabel, daughter of Matred, daughter of Me-Zahab.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Hadad died. And the chiefs of Edom were: chiefs Timna, Aliah, Jetheth,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Oholibamah, Elah, Pinon,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Kenaz, Teman, Mibzar,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Magdiel, and Iram. These are the chiefs of Edom.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These are the sons of Israel: Reuben, Simeon, Levi, Judah, Issachar, Zebulun,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Dan, Joseph, Benjamin, Naphtali, Gad, and Asher.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Judah: Er, Onan and Shelah; these three were born to him from Bathshua the Canaanite. Now Er, Judah’s firstborn, was evil in the sight of Yahweh, and he put him to death.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Tamar his daughter-in-law bore Perez and Zerah to him. The sons of Judah were five in all.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Perez: Hezron and Hamul.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Zerah: Zimri, Ethan, Heman, Calcol, and Dara, five in all.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The son of Carmi: Achar, the troubler of Israel, who acted unfaithfully in the matter of the devoted thing.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the son of Ethan was Azariah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Hezron who were born to him: Jerahmeel, Ram, and Caleb.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ram fathered Amminadab, and Amminadab fathered Nahshon, prince of the sons of Judah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Nahshon fathered Salma, and Salma fathered Boaz.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Boaz fathered Obed, and Obed fathered Jesse.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Jesse fathered Eliab his firstborn, Abinadab the second, Shimea the third,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Nethanel the fourth, Raddai the fifth,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ozem the sixth, David the seventh.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And their sisters were Zeruiah and Abigail. The sons of Zeruiah: Abishai, Joab, and Asahel, three.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Abigail bore Amasa, and the father of Amasa was Jether the Ishmaelite.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Caleb the son of Hezron fathered children by Azubah his wife and by Jerioth. And these were her sons: Jesher, Shobab, and Ardon.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And when Azubah died, Caleb married Ephrathah, and she bore Hur to him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Hur fathered Uri, and Uri fathered Bezalel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And afterward Hezron went in to the daughter of Makir the father of Gilead. And he married her when he was sixty years old. And she bore Segub to him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Segub fathered Jair, and he had twenty-three cities in the land of Gilead.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Geshur and Aram took Havvoth-Jair from them, Kenath and its villages, sixty cities. All these were the descendants of Makir, the father of Gilead.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And after the death of Hezron in Caleb-Ephrathah, Abijah the wife of Hezron bore to him Ashhur, the father of Tekoa.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Jerahmeel the firstborn of Hezron were Ram his firstborn, Bunah, Oren, Ozem, and Ahijah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Jerahmeel had another wife, and her name was Atarah. She was the mother of Onam.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Ram the firstborn of Jerahmeel were Maaz, Jamin, and Eker.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Onam were Shammai and Jada. And the sons of Shammai were Nadab and Abishur.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the name of the wife of Abishur was Abihail, and she bore to him Ahban and Molid.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Nadab were Seled and Appaim. And Seled died without children.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Appaim: Ishi. The sons of Ishi: Sheshan. The sons of Sheshan: Ahlai.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Jada the brother of Shammai: Jether and Jonathan. And Jether died without children.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Jonathan: Peleth and Zaza. These were the children of Jerahmeel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Sheshan had no sons, only daughters, but Sheshan had an Egyptian slave, and his name was Jarha.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: So Sheshan gave his daughter to Jarha his slave for a wife, and she bore to him Attai.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Attai fathered Nathan, and Nathan fathered Zabad.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Zabad fathered Ephlal, and Ephlal fathered Obed.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Obed fathered Jehu, and Jehu fathered Azariah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Azariah fathered Helez, and Helez fathered Eleasah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Eleasah fathered Sismai, and Sismai fathered Shallum.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Shallum fathered Jekamiah, and Jekamiah fathered Elishama.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Caleb the brother of Jerahmeel were Mesha his firstborn; he was the father of Ziph. The sons of Mareshah: Hebron.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Hebron were Korah, Tappuah, Rekem, and Shema.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Shema fathered Raham, the father of Jorkeam. And Rekem fathered Shammai.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the son of Shammai was Maon, and Maon was the father of Beth-Zur.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ephah, the concubine of Caleb, gave birth to Haran, Moza, and Gazez. And Haran fathered Gazez.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Jahdai were Regem, Jotham, Geshan, Pelet, Ephah, and Shaaph.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Maacah, the concubine of Caleb, gave birth to Sheber and Tirhanah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: She also gave birth to Shaaph the father of Madmannah, Sheva the father of Machbenah and the father of Gibea; and the daughter of Caleb was Acsah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text:
These were the descendants of Caleb.
The sons of Hur the firstborn of Ephrathah: Shobal the father of Kiriath-Jearim,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Salma the father of Bethlehem, and Hareph the father of Beth-Gader.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Shobal the father of Kiriath-Jearim had other sons: Haroeh, half of the Menuhoth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the families of Kiriath-Jearim: the Ithrites, the Puthites, the Shumathites, and the Mishraites. From these descended the Zorathites and the Eshtaolites.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Salma: Bethlehem, the Netophathites, Ataroth-Beth-Joab, and half of the Manahathites, the Zorites.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the families of the scribes who lived at Jabez: the Tirathites, the Shimeathites, and the Sucathites. These were the Kenites who came from Hammath, the father of the house of Recab.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These were the sons of David who were born to him in Hebron: the firstborn, Amnon, by Ahinoam the Jezreelite; the second, Daniel, by Abigail the Carmelite;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: the third, Absalom, the son of Maacah the daughter of Talmai, king of Geshur; the fourth, Adonijah, the son of Haggith;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: the fifth, Shephatiah, by Abital; the sixth, Ithream, by his wife Eglah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Six were born to him in Hebron. And he reigned there seven years and six months. And he reigned thirty-three years in Jerusalem.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these were born to him in Jerusalem: Shimea, Shobab, Nathan, and Solomon, four by Bathshua the daughter of Ammiel;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: then Ibhar, Elishama, Eliphelet,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Nogah, Nepheg, Japhia,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Elishama, Eliada, and Eliphelet, nine.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: All these were the sons of David, besides the sons of the concubines. And Tamar was their sister.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now the son of Solomon was Rehoboam; Abijah was his son, Asa was his son, Jehoshaphat was his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Joram was his son, Ahaziah was his son, Joash was his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Amaziah was his son, Azariah was his son, Jotham was his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ahaz was his son, Hezekiah was his son, Manasseh was his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Amon was his son, Josiah was his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Josiah: Johanan the firstborn, the second Jehoiakim, the third Zedekiah, the fourth Shallum.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the descendants of Jehoiakim: Jeconiah his son, Zedekiah his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Jeconiah, the captive: Shealtiel his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Malchiram, Pedaiah, Shenazzar, Jekamiah, Hoshama, and Nedabiah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Pedaiah: Zerubbabel and Shimei. And the sons of Zerubbabel: Meshullam and Hananiah, and Shelomith their sister,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Hashubah, Ohel, Berekiah, Hasadiah, and Jushab-Hesed, five.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Hananiah: Pelatiah and Jeshaiah. The sons of Rephaiah, the sons of Arnan, the sons of Obadiah, the sons of Shecaniah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Shecaniah: Shemaiah. And the sons of Shemaiah: Hattush, Igal, Bariah, Neariah, and Shaphat, six.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Neariah: Elioenai, Hezekiah, and Azrikam, three.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Elioenai: Hodaviah, Eliashib, Pelaiah, Akkub, Johanan, Delaiah, and Anani, seven.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Judah: Perez, Hezron, Carmi, Hur, and Shobal.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Reaiah the son of Shobal fathered Jahath, and Jahath fathered Ahumai and Lahad. These were the clans of the Zorathites.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these were the sons of Etam: Jezreel, Ishma, and Idbash. And the name of their sister was Hazzelelponi,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Penuel was the father of Gedor, and Ezer was the father of Hushah. These were the sons of Hur, the firstborn of Ephrathah, the father of Bethlehem.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ashhur, the father of Tekoa, had two wives: Helah and Naarah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Naarah bore him Ahuzzam, Hepher, Temeni, and Haahashtari. These were the sons of Naarah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Helah: Zereth, Izhar, and Ethnan.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Koz fathered Anub, Zobebah, and the clans of Aharhel, the son of Harum.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Jabez was more honorable than his brothers. And his mother called his name Jabez, saying, “Because I bore him in pain.”
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Jabez called upon the God of Israel, saying, “Oh that you would surely bless me and enlarge my border. And may your hand be with me, that you would keep me from evil so that it might not harm me!” And God granted what he asked.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Chelub, the brother of Shuhah, fathered Mehir. He was the father of Eshton.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Eshton fathered Beth-Rapha, Paseah, and Tehinnah, the father of the city of Nahash. These are the men of Recah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Kenaz: Othniel and Seraiah. And the sons of Othniel: Hathath.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Meonothai fathered Ophrah; and Seraiah fathered Joab, the father of Ge-Harashim, because they were craftsmen.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Caleb, the son of Jephunneh: Iru, Elah, and Naam. And the sons of Elah: Kenaz.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Jehallelel: Ziph, Ziphah, Tiria, and Asarel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Ezrah: Jether, Mered, Epher, and Jalon. And she became pregnant with Miriam, Shammai, and Ishbah, the father of Eshtemoa.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And his Judahite wife bore Jered the father of Gedor, Heber the father of Soco, and Jekuthiel the father of Zanoah. And these were the sons of Bithiah daughter of Pharaoh, whom Mered married.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of the wife of Hodiah, the sister of Naham, were the fathers of Keilah the Garmite and Eshtemoa the Maacathite.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Shimon: Amnon, Rinnah, Ben-Hanan, and Tolon. The sons of Ishi: Zoheth and Ben-Zoheth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Shelah, the son of Judah: Er the father of Lecah, Laadah the father of Mareshah, and the families of the house of linen workers at Beth Ashbea;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Jokim, and the men of Cozeba, and Joash, and Saraph, who ruled in Moab and returned to Lehem. (Now the records are ancient).
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These were the potters and inhabitants of Netaim and Gederah. They lived there with the king in his service.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Simeon: Nemuel, Jamin, Jarib, Zerah, Shaul.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Shallum his son, Mibsam his son, Mishma his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Mishma: Hammuel his son, Zaccur his son, Shimei his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Shimei had sixteen sons and six daughters, but his brothers did not have many children. But all their families did not multiply like the men of Judah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they lived in Beersheba, Moladah, Hazar Shual,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Bilhah, Ezem, Tolad,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Bethuel, Hormah, Ziklag,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Beth-Marcaboth, Hazar-Susim, Beth-Biri, and Shaaraim. These were their cities until David reigned.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And their villages were Etam, Ain, Rimmon, Token, and Ashan, five cities
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and all their villages that surrounding these cities as far as Baal. These were their settlements, and they kept a genealogical record for them.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Meshobab, Jamlech, and Joshah the son of Amaziah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Joel, and Jehu the son of Joshibiah, son of Seraiah, son of Asiel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Elioenai, Jaakobah, Jeshohaiah, Asaiah, Adiel, Jesimiel, Benaiah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Ziza the son of Shiphi, son of Allon, son of Jedaiah, son of Shimri, son of Shemaiah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These mentioned by name were leaders in their families, and their fathers’ households increased greatly.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they went to the entrance of Gedor, up to the east side of the valley, to seek pasture for their flocks.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they found fertile and good pasture, and the land was very broad, quiet, and at ease, for the former inhabitants there were from Ham.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These, mentioned by name, came in the days of Hezekiah, king of Judah, and attacked their tents and the Meunites who were found there. And they devoted them to destruction to this day, and they settled among them because there was pasture there for their flocks.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And some of them from the Simeonites went to Mount Seir, five hundred men. And Pelatiah, Neariah, Rephaiah, and Uzziel, the sons of Ishi, were under their leadership.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they destroyed the remainder of the Amalekites who had escaped, and they have lived there to this day.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Reuben the firstborn of Israel (for he was the firstborn, but when he defiled the couch of his father, his birthright was given to the sons of Joseph, the son of Israel, so that he was not enrolled in the genealogy as the firstborn,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: though Judah became strong among his brothers and a chief came from him, but the birthright belonged to Joseph).
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Reuben the firstborn of Israel: Enoch, Pallu, Hezron, and Carmi.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Joel: Shemaiah his son, Gog his son, Shimei his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Micah his son, Reaiah his son, Baal his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Beerah his son, a leader of the Reubenites, whom Tiglath-Pilneser king of Assyria deported into exile.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And his kinsmen by their families, when their generations were recorded in the genealogy: the chief, Jeiel, and Zechariah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Bela son of Azaz, son of Shema, son of Joel, who lived in Aroer, as far as Nebo and Baal-Meon.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: He also lived to the east up to the entrance of the desert this side of the River Euphrates, for their livestock had multiplied in the land of Gilead.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And in the days of Saul they made war against the Hagrites, and they fell into their hand. And they lived in their tents in all the region east of Gilead.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Gad lived near to them in the land of Bashan as far as Salecah:
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Joel the chief, Shapham the second, Janai, and Shaphat in Bashan.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And their kinsmen according to their fathers’ households: Michael, Meshullam, Sheba, Jorai, Jacan, Zia, and Eber, seven.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These were the sons of Abihail the son of Huri, son of Jaroah, son of Gilead, son of Michael, son of Jeshishai, son of Jahdo, son of Buz.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ahi son of Abdiel, son of Guni, was chief in their fathers’ households.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they lived in Gilead, in Bashan, and in its towns, and in all the pasturelands of Sharon to their limits.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: All of them were enrolled in the genealogy in the days of Jotham, king of Judah, and in the days of Jeroboam, king of Israel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The Reubenites, the Gadites, and the half-tribe of Manasseh had valiant men who carried a shield and a sword, and archers, and who were expert in war, forty-four thousand seven hundred and sixty for going out as an army.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they made war against the Hagrites, Jetur, Naphish, and Nodab.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they were helped against them, and the Hagrites and all who were with them were given into their hand, for they cried out to God in the battle, and he responded to their prayer because they trusted in him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they captured their livestock: fifty thousand of their camels; two hundred and fifty thousand sheep; two thousand donkeys; and one hundred thousand men alive.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: For many were slain because the war was of God. And they lived under them until the exile.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of the half-tribe of Manasseh lived in the land from Bashan to Baal-Hermon, Senir, and Mount Hermon. They were numerous.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now these were the heads of their fathers’ households: Epher, Ishi, Eliel, Azriel, Jeremiah, Hodaviah, and Jahdiel, mighty men of strength, famous men, heads of their fathers’ households.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: But they transgressed against the God of their ancestors and prostituted themselves after the gods of the peoples of the land, whom God had destroyed before them.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: So the God of Israel stirred up the spirit of Pul, king of Assyria, and the spirit of Tiglath-Pilneser, king of Assyria, and he took them into exile, namely, the Reubenites, the Gadites, and the half-tribe of Manasseh. And he brought them to Halah, Habor, Hara, and the river Gozan, until this day.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Levi: Gershon, Kohath, and Merari.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Kohath: Amram, Izhar, Hebron, and Uzziel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The children of Amram: Aaron, Moses, and Miriam. The sons of Aaron: Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar, and Ithamar.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Eleazar fathered Phinehas; Phinehas fathered Abishua;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Abishua fathered Bukki; Bukki fathered Uzzi;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Uzzi fathered Zerahiah; Zerahiah fathered Meraioth;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Meraioth fathered Amariah; Amariah fathered Ahitub;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ahitub fathered Zadok; Zadok fathered Ahimaaz;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ahimaaz fathered Azariah; Azariah fathered Johanan;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Johanan fathered Azariah. It was he who served as priest in the temple that Solomon built in Jerusalem.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Azariah fathered Amariah; Amariah fathered Ahitub;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ahitub fathered Zadok; Zadok fathered Shallum;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Shallum fathered Hilkiah; Hilkiah fathered Azariah;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Azariah fathered Seraiah; Seraiah fathered Jehozadak.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Jehozadak went into exile when Yahweh sent Judah and Jerusalem into exile by the hand of Nebuchadnezzar.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Levi: Gershom, Kohath, and Merari.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now these are the names of the sons of Gershom: Libni and Shimei.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Kohath: Amram, Izhar, Hebron, and Uzziel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Merari: Mahli and Mushi. Now these are the families of the Levites according to their ancestors.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Of Gershom: Libni his son, Jahath his son, Zimmah his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Joah his son, Iddo his son, Zerah his son, Jeatherai his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Kohath: Amminadab his son, Korah his son, Assir his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Elkanah his son, Ebiasaph his son, Assir his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Tahath his son, Uriel his son, Uzziah his son, and Shaul his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Elkanah: Amasai and Ahimoth,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Elkanah his son, Zophai his son, Nahath his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Eliab his son, Jeroham his son, Elkanah his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Samuel: Joel his firstborn and Abijah the second.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Merari: Mahli, Libni his son, Shimei his son, Uzzah his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Shimea his son, Haggiah his son, and Asaiah his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now these are the men whom David appointed for control of singing in the house of Yahweh where the ark rested.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: They were ministering with song before the tabernacle of the tent of assembly until Solomon built the temple of Yahweh in Jerusalem. And they stood according to their order with respect to their duty.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now these are those who served and their sons. Of the sons of the Kohathites: Heman the singer, the son of Joel, son of Samuel,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: son of Elkanah, son of Jeroham, son of Eliel, son of Toah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: son of Zuph, son of Elkanah, son of Mahath, son of Amasai,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: son of Elkanah, son of Joel, son of Azariah, son of Zephaniah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: son of Tahath, son of Assir, son of Ebiasaph, son of Korah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: son of Izhar, son of Kohath, son of Levi, son of Israel;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and his brother Asaph, who stood on his right namely, Asaph the son of Berechiah, son of Shimea,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: son of Michael, son of Baaseiah, son of Malkijah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: son of Ethni, son of Zerah, son of Adaiah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: son of Ethan, son of Zimmah, son of Shimei,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: son of Jahath, son of Gershom, son of Levi.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: On the left were their brothers, the sons of Merari: Ethan the son of Kishi, son of Abdi, son of Malluch,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: son of Hashabiah, son of Amaziah, son of Hilkiah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: son of Amzi, son of Bani, son of Shemer,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: son of Mahli, son of Mushi, son of Merari, son of Levi.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And their brothers the Levites were appointed for all the service of the tabernacle of the house of God.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: But Aaron and his sons made offerings on the altar of burnt offering and on the altar of incense for all the work of the most holy place, and to make atonement for Israel, according to all that Moses the servant of God had commanded.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now these are the sons of Aaron: Eleazar his son, Phinehas his son, Abishua his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Bukki his son, Uzzi his son, Zerahiah his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Meraioth his son, Amariah his son, Ahitub his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Zadok his son, Ahimaaz his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these are their dwellings according to their settlements within their borders: to the sons of Aaron of the clans of Kohathites, for the first lot was theirs,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and they gave to them Hebron in the land of Judah and its surrounding pasturelands,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: but the fields of the city and its villages they gave to Caleb the son of Jephunneh.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: To the sons of Aaron they gave the cities of refuge: Hebron, Libnah with its pasturelands, Jattir, Eshtemoa with its pasturelands,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Hilen with its pasturelands, Debir with its pasturelands,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ashan with its pasturelands, and Beth-Shemesh with its pasturelands.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And from the tribe of Benjamin, Geba with its pasturelands, Alemeth with its pasturelands, and Anathoth with its pasturelands. All their cities were thirteen cities throughout their clans.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: To the Kohathites who remained from the family of the half-tribe, the half of Manasseh, were given by lot ten cities.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: To the Gershomites according to their clans thirteen cities were allotted out of the tribe of Issachar, out of the tribe of Asher, out of the tribe of Naphtali, and out of the tribe of Manasseh in Bashan.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: To the Merarites twelve cities were allotted according to their clans out of the tribe of Reuben, out of the tribe of Gad, and out of the tribe of Zebulun.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: So the Israelites gave the Levites the cities with their pasturelands.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they gave by lot out of the tribe of Judah, out of the tribe of Simeon, and out of the tribe of Benjamin these cities that are mentioned by name.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of the clans of the sons of Kohath were cities of their territory out of the tribe of Ephraim.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they gave them the cities of refuge: Shechem with its pasturelands in the hill country of Ephraim, Gezer with its pasturelands,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Jokmeam with its pasturelands, Beth-Horon with its pasturelands,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Aijalon with its pasturelands, and Gath-Rimmon with its pasturelands.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And out of the half-tribe of Manasseh: Aner with its pasturelands, and Bileam with its pasturelands for the remaining the clans of the Kohathites.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: To the Gershomites were given out of the clan of the half-tribe of Manasseh: Golan in Bashan with its pasturelands and Ashtaroth with its pasturelands.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And out of the tribe of Issachar: Kedesh with its pasturelands, Daberath with its pasturelands,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ramoth with its pasturelands, and Anem with its pasturelands.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And out of the tribe of Asher: Mashal with its pasturelands, Abdon with its pasturelands,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Hukok with its pasturelands, and Rehob with its pasturelands.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And out of the tribe of Naphtali: Kedesh in Galilee with its pasturelands, Hammon with its pasturelands, and Kiriathaim with its pasturelands.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: To the remainder of the Merarites were allotted out of the tribe of Zebulun: Rimmono with its pasturelands, Tabor with its pasturelands.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And beyond the Jordan at Jericho, on the east side of the Jordan, out of the tribe of Reuben: Bezer in the wilderness with its pasturelands, Jahzah with its pasturelands,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Kedemoth with its pasturelands, and Mephaath with its pasturelands.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And out of the tribe of Gad: Ramoth in Gilead with its pasturelands, Mahanaim with its pasturelands,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Heshbon with its pasturelands, and Jazer with its pasturelands.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Issachar: Tola, Puah, Jashub, and Shimron, four.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Tola: Uzzi, Rephaiah, Jeriel, Jahmai, Ibsam, and Shemuel, heads of their fathers’ houses; for Tola, mighty warriors of their generations, their number in the days of David were twenty-two thousand six hundred.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Uzzi: Izrahiah. And the sons of Izrahiah: Michael, Obadiah, Joel, and Isshiah; all five of them were chiefs.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And in addition to them, according to their generations, according to the house of their fathers, were troops of the army for war: thirty-six thousand. For they had many wives and sons.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now their kinsmen belonging to all the clans of Issachar were in all eighty-seven thousand mighty warriors, enrolled according to their genealogy.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Benjamin: Bela, Beker, and Jediael, three.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Bela: Ezbon, Uzzi, Uzziel, Jerimoth, and Iri, five, the heads of the house of the fathers, mighty warriors. And their enrollment by genealogy was twenty-two thousand thirty-four.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Beker: Zemirah, Joash, Eliezer, Elioenai, Omri, Jeremoth, Abijah, Anathoth, and Alemeth. All these were the sons of Beker.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And their enrollment by genealogy according to their generations, as heads of the house of their fathers, mighty warriors, was twenty thousand two hundred.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Jediael: Bilhan. And the sons of Bilhan: Jeush, Benjamin, Ehud, Kenaanah, Zethan, Tarshish, and Ahishahar.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: All these were the sons of Jediael according to the heads of the families, mighty warriors, seventeen thousand two hundred, able to go to war.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Shuppim and Huppim were the sons of Ir; Hushim, the son of Aher.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Naphtali: Jahziel, Guni, Jezer, and Shallum, the descendants of Bilhah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Manasseh: Asriel, whom his Aramean concubine bore; she gave birth to Makir the father of Gilead.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Machir took a wife for Huppim and for Shuppim. And the name of his sister was Maacah. And the name of the second, Zelophehad. And Zelophehad had daughters.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Maacah the wife of Machir gave birth to a son, and she called his name Peresh. And the name of his brother was Sheresh, and his sons were Ulam and Rekem.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Ulam: Bedan. These were the sons of Gilead the son of Makir, son of Manasseh.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And his sister, Hammolecheth, gave birth to Ishhod, Abiezer, and Mahlah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Shemida were Ahian, Shechem, Likhi, and Aniam.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Ephraim: Shuthelah and Bered his son, Tahath his son, Eleadah his son, Tahath his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Zabad his son, Shuthelah his son, and Ezer and Elead. And the men of Gath who were born in the land killed them because they came down to take their livestock.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ephraim their father mourned many days, and his brothers came to comfort him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ephraim went in to his wife, and she conceived and gave birth to a son. And he called his name Beriah because disaster had been upon his house.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And his daughter was Sheerah, and she built Lower and Upper Beth-Horon and Uzzen-Sheerah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Rephah was his son, and Resheph, and Telah his son, Tahan his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ladan his son, Ammihud his son, Elishama his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Nun his son, Joshua his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And their property and their dwellings were Bethel and its towns. And to the east, Naaran. And to the west, Gezer and its towns, and Shechem and its towns, up to Aija and its towns.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And along the borders of the sons of Manasseh: Beth-Shean and its towns, Taanach and its towns, Megiddo and its towns, and Dor and its towns. In these lived the sons of Joseph the son of Israel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Asher: Imnah, Ishvah, Ishvi, Beriah, and their sister Serah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Beriah: Heber and Malkiel, who was the father of Birzayith.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Heber fathered Japhlet, Shomer, Hotham, and their sister Shua.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Japhlet: Pasach, Bimhal, and Ashvath. These were the sons of Japhlet.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Shemer: Ahi, Rohgah, Jehubbah, and Aram.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Helem his brother: Zophah, Imna, Shelesh, and Amal.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Zophah: Suah, Harnepher, Shual, Beri, Imrah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Bezer, Hod, Shamma, Shilshah, Ithran, and Beera.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Jether: Jephunneh, Pispah, and Ara.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Ulla: Arah, Hanniel, and Rizia.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: All of these were the sons of Asher, heads of the house of the fathers, chosen mighty warriors, heads of the princes. And their number enrolled by genealogy, in the army for the war, was twenty-six thousand men.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now Benjamin fathered Bela his firstborn, Ashbel the second, Aharah the third,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Nohah the fourth, and Rapha the fifth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Bela had sons: Addar, Gera, Abihud,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Abishua, Naaman, Ahoah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Gera, Shephuphan, and Huram.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these are the sons of Ehud (these were heads of the families for the inhabitants of Geba, and they took them away to Manahath):
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Naaman, Ahijah, and Gera, who took them away. And he fathered Uzza and Ahihud.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Shaharaim fathered children in the fields of Moab after he had sent them away—Hushim and Baara, his wives.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And he fathered by Hodesh his wife Jobab, Zibia, Mesha, Malcam,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Jeuz, Sakia, and Mirmah. These were his sons, heads of the families.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And by Husham he fathered Abitub and Elpaal.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Elpaal: Eber, Misham, Shemed (he built Ono and Lod with its towns),
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Beriah and Shema who were the heads of the families of the inhabitants of Aijalon (they themselves chased away the inhabitants of Gath).
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now Ahio, Shashak, Jeremoth,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Zebadiah, Arad, Eder,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Michael, Ishpah, and Joha were sons of Beriah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Zebadiah, Meshullam, Hizki, Heber,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ishmerai, Izliah, and Jobab were the sons of Elpaal.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Jakim, Zikri, Zabdi,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Elienai, Zillethai, Eliel,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Adaiah, Beraiah, and Shimrath were the sons of Shimei.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ishpan, Eber, Eliel,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Abdon, Zikri, Hanan,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Hananiah, Elam, Antothijah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Iphdeiah, and Peniel were the sons of Shashak.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Shamsherai, Shehariah, Athaliah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Jaareshiah, Elijah, and Zikri were the sons of Jeroham.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These were the heads of the families according to their generations, chiefs. These lived in Jerusalem.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Jeiel the father of Gibeon lived in Gibeon. And the name of his wife was Maacah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And his firstborn son was Abdon, then Zur, Kish, Baal, Nadab,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Gedor, Ahio, Zeker,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Mikloth (he fathered Shimeah). Now these also lived nearby their brothers in Jerusalem with their kinsmen.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ner fathered Kish, and Kish fathered Saul, and Saul fathered Jonathan, Malchi-Shua, Abinadab, and Eshbaal.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the son of Jonathan was Merib-baal, and Merib-baal fathered Micah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Micah: Pithon, Melech, Tarea, and Ahaz.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ahaz fathered Jehoaddah, and Jehoaddah fathered Alemeth, Azmaveth, and Zimri. And Zimri fathered Moza.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Moza fathered Binea; Raphah was his son, Eleasah his son, and Azel his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Azel had six sons, and these are their names: Azrikam, Bokeru, Ishmael, Sheariah, Obadiah, and Hanan. All these were the sons of Azel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Eshek his brother: Ulam his firstborn, Jeush the second, and Eliphelet the third.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Ulam were men who were mighty warriors, bowmen, and they had many sons and grandsons, one hundred and fifty. All these were Benjaminites.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: So all Israel was enrolled in genealogy. And behold, they were written in the book of the kings of Israel. And Judah was taken away to Babylon on account of their sin.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now the first inhabitants who were settled on their property in their cities in Israel were the priests, the Levites, and the temple servants.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And some of the people of Judah, Benjamin, Ephraim, and Manasseh lived in Jerusalem:
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Uthai the son of Ammihud, son of Omri, son of Imri, son of Bani, from the sons of Perez, the son of Judah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And from the Shilonites: Asaiah the firstborn and his sons.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And from the sons of Zerah: Jeuel and their brethren, six hundred and ninety.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And from the sons of Benjamin: Sallu the son of Meshullam, son of Hodaviah, the son of Hassenuah;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ibneah the son of Jeroham; Elah the son of Uzzi, son of Michri; Meshullam the son of Shephatiah, son of Reuel, son of Ibnijah;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and their brethren according to their generations, nine hundred and fifty-six. All these men were the heads of the families in the house of their fathers.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And from the priests: Jedaiah; Jehoiarib; Jakin;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Azariah son of Hilkiah, son of Meshullam, son of Zadok, son of Meraioth, son of Ahitub, the commander of the house of God;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Adaiah son of Jeroham, son of Pashhur, son of Malkijah; Maasai the son of Adiel, son of Jahzerah, son of Meshullam, son of Meshillemith, son of Immer;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and their kinsmen, heads of the house of their fathers, one thousand seven hundred and sixty mighty men for the work of the service of the house of God.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And from the Levites: Shemaiah son of Hasshub, son of Azrikam, son of Hashabiah, from the sons of Merari;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Bakbakkar; Heresh; Galal; Mattaniah the son of Mica, son of Zicri, son of Asaph;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Obadiah the son of Shemaiah, son of Galal, son of Jeduthun; and Berechiah the son of Asa, son of Elkanah, who lived in the villages of Netophathite.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the gatekeepers were Shallum, Akkub, Talmon, Ahiman, and their brethren (Shallum was the chief);
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: until then they were gatekeepers at the gate of the king on the east side toward the camps of the Levites.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Shallum the son of Kore, son of Ebiasaph, son of Korah, and his kinsmen of the house of his fathers, the Korahites, were over the work of the service, the guardians of the entrances to the tent, and their fathers were over the camp of Yahweh, guardians of the entrance.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Phinehas the son of Eleazar was the leader over them in time past; Yahweh was with him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Zechariah the son of Meshelemiah was gatekeeper at the doorway to the tent of assembly.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: All of them were chosen as gatekeepers at the entrances, two hundred and twelve. They were enrolled by genealogies in their villages. They were established by David and Samuel the seer on account of their faithfulness.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: So they and their sons were over the gates of the house of Yahweh at the house of the tent as guards.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The gatekeepers were on four sides: east, west, north, and south.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And their brethren in their villages were to come every seven days by turn to be with these.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: For the four mighty gatekeepers, they who were Levites, were entrusted and were over the chambers and over the storerooms of the house of God.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they lodged all around the house of God, for upon them was a responsibility. And they had charge of opening the house of God every morning.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And some of them were over the utensils of the service, for they count them when they are brought in and they count them when they are brought out.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And some of them were appointed over the objects, over the objects of the sanctuary, and over the wheat flour and the wine, the olive oil, the frankincense, and the spices.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And some of the sons of the priests mixed the fragrant ointment for the spices.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Mattithiah, one of the Levites, was the firstborn of Shallum the Korahite and was entrusted with the work of the pan breads.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And from the sons of the Kohathites, some of their kinsmen were over the showbread to prepare it every Sabbath.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now these were the singers; the heads of the families of the Levites were in the chambers free from other service, for day and night they were over them on the service.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These were the heads of the families of the Levites according to their genealogies, leaders. These lived in Jerusalem.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these lived in Gibeon: Jeiel the father of Gibeon. And the name of his wife was Maacah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And his firstborn son Abdon, and Zur, Kish, Baal, Ner, Nadab,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Gedor, Ahio, Zechariah, and Mikloth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Mikloth fathered Shimeam. And they also lived nearby their brothers in Jerusalem with their brothers.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ner fathered Kish, and Kish fathered Saul, and Saul fathered Jonathan, Malchi-Shua, Abinadab, and Eshbaal.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the son of Jonathan was Meribaal. And Meribaal fathered Micah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Micah were Pithon, Melech, Tahrea, and Ahaz.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ahaz fathered Jarah, and Jarah fathered Alemeth, Azmaveth, and Zimri. And Zimri fathered Moza,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Moza fathered Binea; and Rephaiah was his son, Eleasah his son, Azel his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Azel had six sons, and these are their names: Azrikam, Bokeru, Ishmael, Sheariah, Obadiah, and Hanan. These were the sons of Azel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now the Philistines fought against Israel, and every Israelite fled away from before the Philistines. And they fell slain upon Mount Gilboa.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the Philistines overtook Saul and his sons. And the Philistines killed Jonathan, Abinadab, and Malki-Shua, the sons of Saul.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the battle was heavy against Saul, and the archers found him, and he was wounded by the archers.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Saul said to his armor-bearer, “Draw your sword and thrust me through with it, lest these uncircumcised come and deal harshly with me.” But he was very afraid. Then Saul took the sword and fell upon it.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: When his armor-bearer saw that Saul was dead, he also fell upon the sword, and he died.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: So Saul died. And his three sons and all his house died together.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And when all the men of Israel who were in the valley saw that they had fled and that Saul and his sons were dead, they abandoned their cities and fled. Then the Philistines came and dwelled in them.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And it happened that on the next day when the Philistines came to strip the dead, they found Saul and his sons fallen on Mount Gilboa.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they stripped him and took his head and his weapons, and they sent them throughout the land of the Philistines to bring news to their idols and the nation.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they put his weapons in the temple of their gods, and they fastened his skull to the temple of Dagon.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: When all Jabesh-Gilead heard all that the Philistines had done to Saul,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: every strong man arose and took the dead body of Saul and the dead bodies of his sons and brought them to Jabesh. And they buried their bones under the oak in Jabesh and fasted seven days.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: So Saul died on account of his sin which he had sinned against Yahweh concerning the command of Yahweh that he did not keep. He also consulted a medium to seek guidance.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: But he did not seek Yahweh. So Yahweh put him to death and turned over the kingship to David, the son of Jesse.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Then all Israel gathered to David in Hebron, saying, “Look—we are your flesh and bones.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: For some time now, even when Saul was king, you were the one who led the army of Israel in battle. And Yahweh your God said to you, ‘You will shepherd my people Israel and will be leader over my people Israel.’”
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Then all the elders of Israel came to the king at Hebron, and David made a covenant with them at Hebron in the presence of Yahweh. And they anointed David as king over Israel according to the word of Yahweh by the hand of Samuel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David and all Israel went to Jerusalem (that is Jebus). And the Jebusites, the inhabitants of the land, were there.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the inhabitants of Jebus said to David, “You will not enter here.” But David captured the stronghold of Zion; that is, the city of David.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Then David said, “Whoever strikes the Jebusites first will be chief and commander.” And Joab the son of Zeruiah went up first and became chief.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David lived in the fortress. Therefore they called it the city of David.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And he built the city all around from the Millo and up to the circuit. And Joab restored the remainder of the city.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David became greater and greater. And Yahweh of hosts was with him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now these are the chiefs of the mighty men who were for David, who gave him strong support in his kingdom, together with all Israel to make him king according to the word of Yahweh concerning Israel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And this is the numbering of the mighty warriors who were for David: Jashobeam son of Hachmoni was chief of the three. He himself raised his spear against three hundred whom he killed on one occasion.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And after him was Eleazar son of Dodo the Ahohite. He was among the three mighty warriors.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: He himself was with David at Pas-Dammim when the Philistines were gathered there for the battle. And there was a plot of the field filled with barley, and the people fled before the Philistines.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: But they took their stand in the middle of the plot and defended it. And they killed the Philistines. And Yahweh saved them with a great victory.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And three of the thirty chiefs went down toward the rock to David at the cave of Adullam when the army of the Philistines was encamped in the valley of Rephaim.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David was then in the stronghold, and the garrison of the Philistines was then in Bethlehem.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David had a craving, and he said, “Who could give me a drink of water from the well of Bethlehem that is by the gate!”
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Then the three broke through into the camp of the Philistines and drew water from the well of Bethlehem that was by the gate and brought it and came to David. But David would not drink it and poured it out before Yahweh.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And he said, “Far be it from me that I would do this before my God. Shall I drink the lifeblood of these men? For at the risk of their lives they brought it.” And he was not willing to drink it. These things the three mighty men did.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now Abishai the brother of Joab was himself the head of the three. And he roused himself with his spear against three hundred whom he killed and made a name for himself among the three.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: He was twice as renowned among the three and was their commander. But he did not attain to the three.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Benaiah the son of Jehoiada was a strong man from Kabzeel, one who did great deeds. He himself struck down two sons of Ariel of Moab. And he himself went down and struck down a lion within a pit on a snowy day.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And he himself struck down an Egyptian man, a large man five cubits tall. And in the hand of the Egyptian was a spear like a weaver’s beam. But he went down to him with a club and seized the spear from the hand of the Egyptian and killed him with his own spear.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These things Benaiah son of Jehoiada did and had a name among the three mighty warriors.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: He himself was certainly distinguished among the thirty, but he did not attain to the three. And David appointed him over his bodyguard.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now the mighty warriors of the troops were Asahel the brother of Joab, Elhanan the son of Dodo from Bethlehem,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Shammoth the Harorite, Helez the Pelonite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ira the son of Ikkesh the Tekoite, Abiezer the Anathothite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Sibbecai the Hushathite, Ilai the Ahohite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Maharai the Netophathite, Heled the son of Baanah the Netophathite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ittai the son of Ribai from Gibeah of the people of Benjamin, Benaiah the Pirathonite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Hurai of the valleys of Gaash, Abiel the Arbathite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Azmaveth the Baharumite, Eliahba the Shaalbonite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: the sons of Hashem the Gizonite, Jehonathan the son of Shagee the Hararite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ahiam the son of Sacar the Hararite, Eliphal the son of Ur,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Hepher the Mekerathite, Ahijah the Pelonite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Hezro the Carmelite, Naari the son of Ezbai,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Joel the brother of Nathan, Mibhar the son of Hagri,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Zelek the Ammonite, Naharai the Beerothite, the bearer of the weapons of Joab the son of Zeruiah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ira the Ithrite, Gareb the Ithrite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Uriah the Hittite, Zabad the son of Ahlai,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Adina the son of Shiza the Reubenite, a leader of the Reubenites, and thirty with him,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Hanan the son of Maacah, Jehoshaphat the Mithnite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Uzzia the Ashterathite, Shama and Jeiel the sons of Hotham the Aroerite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Jediael the son of Shimri and Joha his brother the Tizite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Eliel the Mahavite, Jeribai and Joshaviah the sons of Elnaam, Ithmah the Moabite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Eliel, Obed, and Jaasiel the Mezobaite.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now these are the ones who came to David at Ziklag while he was still shut up because of Saul, the son of Kish. And they were the mighty warriors helping with the war.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: They were armed with the bow, able to shoot right-handed or left-handed, slinging stones or shooting arrows with the bow; they were kinsmen of Saul from Benjamin.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The leader was Ahiezer, then Jehoash, sons of Shemaah the Gibeonite; Jeiel and Pelet, sons of Azmaveth; Beracah; Jehu the Anathothite;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ishmaiah the Gibeonite, a mighty warrior among the thirty who was over the thirty; Jeremiah; Jahaziel; Johanan; Jozabad the Gederathite;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Eluzai; Jerimoth; Bealiah; Shemariah; Shephatiah the Hariphite;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Elkanah, Isshiah, Azarel, Joezer, and Jashobeam the Korahites;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Joelah and Zebadiah, sons of Jeroham from the Gedor.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And from the Gadites, valiant mighty warriors, soldiers fit for war, expert with shield and spear, defected to David at the fortress toward the wilderness. And they had faces like lions and were swift as gazelles upon the mountains.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ezer the chief, Obadiah second, Eliab third,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Mishmannah fourth, Jeremiah fifth,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Attai sixth, Eliel seventh,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Jehonan eighth, Elzabad ninth,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Jeremiah tenth, Macbannai eleventh.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These were the sons of Gad, leaders of the army. The smallest one was as a hundred, and the greatest as a thousand.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These were they who crossed the Jordan in the first month, when it was filled over its banks. And they put to flight all who were in the valley to the east and to the west.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And some of the sons of Benjamin and from Judah came to the fortress, to David.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David went out to meet them and answered and said to them, “If you come in peace to me, to help me, my heart will be joined with you, but if you come to betray me to my adversaries, although there is no wrong on my hands, may the God of our fathers see and pass judgment.”
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text:
Then the Spirit came upon Amasai, chief of the thirty who said:
“We are yours, O David!
And we are with you, O son of Jesse!
Peace! Peace to you, and peace to those who help you,
for your God helps you.”
So David appointed them as heads of the troops.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And some Manassites deserted to David when he came with the Philistines to the battle against Saul, but he did not help them, for the rulers of the Philistines sent him away upon counsel, saying, “He will desert to his master Saul at the cost of our heads.”
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: When he went to Ziklag some Manassites deserted to him: Adnah, Jehozabad, Jediael, Michael, Jozabad, Elihu, and Zillethai, heads of the thousands that were for Manasseh.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they themselves helped David against the troops, for all of them were mighty men of strength and were commanders in the army.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Day in and day out they came to David to help him until there was a great army, like the army of God.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these are the numbers of the chiefs of those prepared for the army who came to David at Hebron to turn the kingdom of Saul over to him according to the word of Yahweh.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Judah bearing shield and spear: six thousand eight hundred armed troops.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: From the men of Simeon, mighty warriors of strength for war: seven thousand one hundred.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: From the Levites: four thousand six hundred.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Jehoiada the chief officer of the house of Aaron, and with him, three thousand seven hundred.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Zadok, a young man, a mighty warrior of strength, and the house of his father: twenty-two commanders.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: From the men of Benjamin, kinsmen of Saul, three thousand, and even still the majority of them remained loyal to the house of Saul.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And from the men of Ephraim: twenty thousand eight hundred mighty warriors of strength, famous men in the house of their fathers.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And from the half-tribe of Manasseh: eighteen thousand who were designated by name to come to make David king.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And from the men of Issachar: men who were skilled in understanding the times to know what Israel should do. Their chiefs were two hundred, and all their kinsmen were under their command.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: From Zebulun, those who went out armed, equipped for battle with all the weapons of war: fifty thousand to help David with singleness of purpose.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: From Naphtali: one thousand commanders; and those with them with shield and spear: thirty-seven thousand.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: From the Danites, those equipped for battle: twenty-eight thousand six hundred.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And from Asher, those who went out armed and prepared for battle: forty thousand.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And from beyond the Jordan, from the Reubenites and the Gadites and the half-tribe of Manasseh, with all their weapons of war for battle: one hundred and twenty thousand.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: All these were men of war arrayed in battle line with a whole heart. They came to Hebron to make David king over all Israel. Likewise, all the rest of Israel had one heart to make David king.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they were there with David three days, eating and drinking, for their kinsmen were prepared for them.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And also their relatives, as far as Issachar and Zebulun and Naphtali, brought food on donkeys, on camels, on mules, and on oxen—provisions of flour, cakes of figs, raisin cakes, wine and oil, cattle and sheep in abundance, for there was great joy in Israel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David consulted with the commanders of thousands and hundreds, with every leader.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David said to all the assembly of Israel, “If it seems good to you and before Yahweh our God, let us send word abroad to our brothers who remain in all the land of Israel and to the priests and Levites with them in the cities with their pasturelands that they might be gathered to us.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Then let us bring around the ark of our God to us, for we did not seek it in the days of Saul.”
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And all the assembly agreed to do so, for the word was pleasing in the eyes of all the people.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David summoned all Israel from Shihor of Egypt up to Lebo-Hamath to bring the ark of God from Kiriath-Jearim.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David and all Israel went up to Baalah, Kiriath-Jearim of Judah, to bring up from there the ark of Yahweh God who is enthroned between the cherubim, which is called the name.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they carried the ark of God upon a new cart from the house of Abinadab, and Uzza and Ahio were driving the cart.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now David and all Israel were celebrating before God with all their strength, and with songs, lyres, harps, tambourines, cymbals, and trumpets.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And when they came to the threshing floor of Kidon, Uzza reached out his hand to hold the ark because the cattle had stumbled.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Yahweh was angry with Uzza, and he struck him down because he reached his hand upon the ark. And he died there before God.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David was angry because Yahweh had broken out in wrath against Uzza. And that place is called Perez Uzza unto this day.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David feared God on that day, saying, “How can I bring the ark of God home to me?”
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: So David did not move the ark to himself into the city of David but diverted it to the house of Obed-Edom the Gittite.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the ark of God remained with the household of Obed-Edom in his house three months. And Yahweh blessed the household of Obed-Edom and all that he had.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Hiram, king of Tyre, sent messengers to David and cedar trees, masons, and carpenters to build a house for him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David knew that Yahweh had established him as king over Israel and that his kingdom was highly exalted for the sake of his people Israel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David took more wives in Jerusalem, and David fathered more sons and daughters.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now these are the names of the children who were born to him in Jerusalem: Shammua, Shobab, Nathan, Solomon,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ibhar, Elishua, Elpelet,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Nogah, Nepheg, Japhia,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Elishama, Beeliada, and Eliphelet.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: When the Philistines heard that David had been anointed as king over all Israel, all the Philistines went up to search for David. But David heard and went out from before them.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now the Philistines came and carried out a raid in the Valley of Rephaim.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Then David inquired of God, saying, “Shall I go up against the Philistines? Will you put them into my hand?” And Yahweh said to him, “Go up. I will put them into your hand.”
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And he went up to Baal-Perazim, and David struck them there. And David said, “God has burst out against my enemies by my hand like waters burst out.” Therefore they will call the name of this place Baal-Perazim.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they abandoned their gods there. And David commanded, and they were burnt with fire.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Then the Philistines carried out another raid in the valley.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Then David inquired again of God. And God said to him, “You shall not go up after them. Go around from before them and come against them the opposite way of the balsam trees.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And it shall be that when you hear the sound of marching in the tops of the balsam trees, then go out into battle, for God goes out before you to strike the camp of the Philistines.”
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David did as God commanded him, and they struck the camp of the Philistines from Gibeon to Gezer.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the fame of David went out through all the lands. And Yahweh put the fear of him upon all the nations.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David built houses for himself in the city of David, and he established a place for the ark of God. And he pitched a tent for it.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Then David ordered that none except the Levites should carry the ark of God, for Yahweh had chosen them to carry the ark of Yahweh and to serve him forever.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David gathered all Israel to Jerusalem to bring up the ark of Yahweh to its place that he had established for it.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David gathered the sons of Aaron and the Levites.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Of the sons of Kohath: Uriel the chief and one hundred and twenty of his brothers.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Of the sons of Merari: Asaiah the chief and two hundred and twenty of his brothers.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Of the sons of Gershom: Joel the chief and one hundred and thirty of his brothers.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Of the sons of Elizaphan: Shemaiah the chief and two hundred of his brothers.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Of the sons of Hebron: Eliel the chief and eighty of his brothers.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Of the sons of Uzziel: Amminadab the chief and one hundred and twelve of his brothers.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Then David summoned Zadok and Abiathar the priests, and the Levites Uriel, Asaiah, Joel, Shemaiah, Eliel, and Amminadab.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And he said to them, “You are the heads of the families for the Levites. Sanctify yourselves and your brothers and bring up the ark of Yahweh, the God of Israel, to the place I have established for it.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Because the first time you did not, and Yahweh our God burst out against us, for we did not care for it according to the law.”
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Then the priests and the Levites sanctified themselves to bring up the ark of Yahweh, the God of Israel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of the Levites carried the ark of God according to what Moses commanded, according to the word of Yahweh, on their shoulders with the carrying poles upon them.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Then David ordered the chiefs of the Levites to appoint their brothers as singers with instruments of song, musical instruments, stringed instruments, and cymbals, raising their voices for joy.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: So the Levites appointed Heman son of Joel, and from his brothers, Asaph the son of Berekiah, and from the sons of Merari, their brothers, Ethan the son of Kushaiah;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and with them their brothers of the second rank, Zechariah the son, Jaaziel, Shemiramoth, Jehiel, Unni, Eliab, Benaiah, Maaseiah, Mattithiah, Eliphelehu, Mikneiah, and the gatekeepers Obed-Edom and Jeiel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now the singers, Heman, Asaph, and Ethan, were to sound bronze cymbals;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Zechariah, Aziel, Shemiramoth, Jehiel, Unni, Eliab, Maaseiah, and Benaiah were to play on harps according to Alamoth;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Mattithiah, Eliphelehu, Mikneiah, Obed-Edom, Jeiel, and Azaziah were to play lyres, directing according to the Sheminith.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Kenaniah, chief of the Levites in singing, was to be an instructor in singing because he understood.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Berekiah and Elkanah were gatekeepers for the ark.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Shebaniah, Jehoshaphat, Nethanel, Amasai, Zechariah, Benaiah, and Elizezer the priests sounded the trumpets before the ark of God. And Obed-Edom and Jehiah were gatekeepers for the ark.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And it happened that David and the elders of Israel and the commanders of thousands went to bring up the ark of the covenant of Yahweh from the house of Obed-Edom with joy.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And it happened that when God helped the Levites carrying the ark of the covenant of Yahweh, they sacrificed seven bulls and seven rams.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now David was clothed with a robe of fine linen; so also all the Levites who were carrying the ark, the singers, and Kenaniah the chief of the singing. And David wore a linen ephod.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And all Israel brought up the ark of the covenant of Yahweh with shouting, with the sound of a shofar, and with trumpets and cymbals, making loud music with musical instruments and stringed instruments.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And when the ark of the covenant of Yahweh came into the city of David, then Michal the daughter of Saul looked down from the window and saw the king, David, leaping and dancing. And she despised him in her heart.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they brought the ark of God and set it inside the tent that David had pitched for it. And they offered burnt offerings and fellowship offerings before God.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And when David had finished offering the burnt offerings and fellowship offerings, he blessed the people in the name of Yahweh.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And he distributed to every man of Israel, both men and women, to each person a loaf of bread, a cake of dates, and a cake of raisins.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Then he appointed some of the Levites as ministers before the ark of Yahweh, to invoke, thank, and praise Yahweh the God of Israel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Asaph was chief, and his second was Zechariah; Jeiel, Shemiramoth, Jehiel, Mattithiah, Eliab, Benaiah, Obed-Edom, and Jeiel were on harps and lyres. And Asaph played on the cymbals.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Benaiah and Jahaziel the priests blew on the trumpets continually before the ark of the covenant of God.
verses.speaker: Narrator
